statements: SELECT * FROM gaming_reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT accessory_name, reviewer_name FROM gaming_reviews WHERE review_id = 5;
SELECT review_text FROM gaming_reviews WHERE reviewer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM gaming_reviews WHERE rating < 2;
SELECT reviewer_name, rating FROM gaming_reviews WHERE accessory_name = 'Headset';
SELECT * FROM gaming_reviews WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT reviewer_name, review_text FROM gaming_reviews WHERE rating = 5;
SELECT reviewer_name, accessory_name FROM gaming_reviews WHERE review_text LIKE '%amazing%';
SELECT review_id, reviewer_name FROM gaming_reviews WHERE accessory_name IN ('controller', 'headset');
SELECT * FROM gaming_reviews WHERE rating >= 4 AND reviewer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM reviews;
SELECT accessory_name, review_text FROM reviews WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT user_id, rating FROM ratings ORDER BY rating_value ASC;
SELECT accessory_name, user_id FROM ratings WHERE rating_value = 5;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM reviews;
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY review_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT user_id, review_text FROM reviews WHERE accessory_name = 'Headphones' AND rating >= 3 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT accessory_name, rating FROM ratings WHERE rating_value BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY accessory_name, rating_value ASC;
SELECT accessory_name, AVG(rating_value) AS average_rating FROM ratings GROUP BY accessory_name HAVING COUNT(user_id) > 5 ORDER BY average_rating DESC;

SELECT review_id, accessory_name, user_id, review_text, rating FROM reviews JOIN ratings ON reviews.accessory_name = ratings.accessory_name AND reviews.user_id = ratings.user_id ORDER BY review_id ASC, rating DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM reviews;
SELECT product_name, rating FROM reviews WHERE rating > 4.0;
SELECT user_id, review_text FROM reviews WHERE review_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT username, email, join_date FROM users ORDER BY join_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM reviews JOIN products ON reviews.product_name = products.product_name JOIN users ON reviews.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT review_id, product_name, rating FROM reviews WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM reviews GROUP BY product_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price > 500 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, join_date FROM users WHERE join_date >= '2020-01-01' ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM reviews;
SELECT review_text, review_rating FROM reviews WHERE user_id = 'abc-123' ORDER BY review_rating DESC;
SELECT accessory_name, accessory_type FROM accessories ORDER BY accessory_name ASC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT AVG(rating_value) AS average_rating FROM ratings WHERE accessory_id = 'xyz-456';
SELECT review_id, review_text FROM reviews ORDER BY review_rating DESC, review_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT accessory_id, accessory_name FROM accessories WHERE accessory_type='phone' ORDER BY accessory_name ASC
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_name LIKE '%John%' OR user_email LIKE '%gmail%'

SELECT review_id, accessory_name, user_name, review_text, review_rating FROM reviews JOIN accessories ON reviews.accessory_id = accessories.accessory_id JOIN users ON reviews.user_id = users.user_id WHERE review_rating > 3 ORDER BY review_rating DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT accessory_name, AVG(rating_value) AS average_rating FROM accessories JOIN ratings ON accessories.accessory_id = ratings.accessory_id GROUP BY accessory_name HAVING average_rating > 4 ORDER BY average_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM reviews;
SELECT review_id, rating FROM reviews WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM accessories ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT accessory_id, accessory_name FROM accessories WHERE accessory_type = 'Headphones';
SELECT * FROM accessories;
SELECT a.accessory_name, r.rating, u.username FROM accessories a JOIN reviews r ON a.accessory_id = r.accessory_id JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT r.review_text, a.accessory_name, u.username FROM reviews r JOIN accessories a ON r.accessory_id = a.accessory_id JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE r.rating > 4;
SELECT a.accessory_name, rt.type_name FROM accessories a JOIN accessory_types rt ON a.accessory_type = rt.type_id;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(r.review_id) AS total_reviews FROM users u LEFT JOIN reviews r ON u.user_id = r.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING total_reviews > 1;
